TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OutputColor extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定如何列印包含彩色或灰階的內容。

span.span: Specifies how to print content that contains color or shades of gray.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對這些用途使用此類型的值：Use the values of this type for these purposes: - 為成員集合，其屬性的，這些值會指定的印表機支援的輸出類型。As members of the collection, which is a property of , these values specify the types of output that a printer supports. （許多印表機支援多個型別）。(Many printers support more than one type.) - 值為屬性，它們會直接以產生的輸出指定之的類型的印表機。As the value of the property of a , they direct the printer to produce the designated type of output. **未知**屬性中不會使用值物件。The **Unknown** value is never used in properties of objects. 您應該永遠不會設定屬性`Unknown`。You should never set a property to `Unknown`. 如果其他產生應用程式已建立*PrintTicket 文件*無法辨識的選項來設定輸出色彩功能 (也就是未定義中的選項[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397))，則該文件，建構應用程式中的物件都有`Unknown`做為值屬性。If some other producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the output color feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have `Unknown` as the value of the property. 雖然和類別無法被繼承，您可以擴充[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)辨識不計算中的列印裝置功能或類別。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 列印結構描述和建立新的列印系統類別擴充](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個列舉來設定值。The following example shows how to use this enumeration to set values. [!code-csharp[XpsPrint#OutputColorAndPageOrientation](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsPrint/CSharp/XpsPrintHelper.cs#outputcolorandpageorientation)] [!code-vb[XpsPrint#OutputColorAndPageOrientation](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsPrint/visualbasic/xpsprinthelper.vb#outputcolorandpageorientation)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputColor Color = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputColor Grayscale = int32(2)

span.span: Output that prints in a grayscale.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputColor Monochrome = int32(3)

summary.span: 以單色和同等濃度列印的輸出。

span.span: Output that prints in a single color and with the same degree of intensity.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputColor Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: 功能 (其選項由這個列舉表示) 設定的選項並未在[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)中定義。

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
